string.value: Teo decided to help make Lionel's necklace. I better ask him right now.

Teo seemed really busy, so I decided to gather up the items myself. I better gather up #b50 #t04000033#s#k, #b50 #t04000030#s#k, and #b7 #t04000061##k and give them to Teo.

#t04000033# #b#c04000033##k/50
#t04000030# #b#c04000030##k/50
#t04000061# #b#c04000061##k/7
After handing Teo the items, he sent it to the jeweler, who made it for him fairly quickly. A beautiful necklace with Alligator and Dragon skin. I better show this to Maya now.

...but then again, I'm really busy myself. Say... I'm sorry, but can you gather the items to make the necklace for me? Well, I can at least introduce you to the jewelry store where they can make it for you.

I'm sorry, but in order to make the necklace, you'll need #b50 #t04000033#s#k, with #b50 #t04000030#s#k to cover the leather, and #b7 #t04000061#s#k for decoration purposes. Please gather them up and bring them to me.
I'd do anything for that girl, but I really am busy here. Please help her out for me. Please change your mind in this.
Thank you. I'll send this to the jewelry store immediately. This should be made fairly quickly, so please wait.
Okay, here it is! Wasn't it fast? Alligator skin + dragon scale, combined to make a one-of-a-kind necklace!
Hmmm? \nI don't think you have enough items here. Please check again and then come to me.
